citeinfo.origin: University of Alaska Fairbanks (UAF), School of Fisheries and Ocean Sciences (SFOS)
citeinfo.title: Tissue samples (and analyses) of subsistence and commercial marine fishes of the eastern Bering Sea (splits of tissue samples to be archived in UAF museum)

descript.purpose: Data to investigate concentrations of mercury in subsistence and commercial marine life and their habitat. Supporting NPMR "Concentrations of Mercury and it's Food Chain and Geochemical Pathways to Selected Commercial and Subsistence Marine Organisms of Eastern Bering Sea.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.

cntaddr.address: NOAA / AFSC / PMEL, 7600 Sand Point Way N.E.
